name: Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus?
overview: The family quiz is a long-held tradition but this year, Abby receives some shocking news: someone has poisoned Uncle Marcus! Make decisions throughout the story to uncover the truth and try to save him before it is too late. - Shot in lockdown and filmed simultaneously in London and Los Angeles - Starring Andy Buckley (The Office) as Uncle Marcus - Starring Susannah Doyle (Black Mirror) and Robbie Kay (Once Upon a Time) - Returning FMV actors Georgia Small (Five Dates) and Al Weaver (The Complex) - From the studios behind The Complex, Five Dates, Night Book and Bloodshore
